name: Adventures of Garth Ropod
description:
Submission for The HEART JAM 2018

Time was scarce, sleep was scarce, and to everyone else, I was scarce during the making of The Adventures of Garth Ropod. In the game itself, your time on earth is scarce, the females with which you need to couple to perpetuate your species, and your own bug legacy are scarce, relative to the multitude of competitive males... and safety is scarce, as danger is in abundance... enjoy!
